Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.jsword

Interface JSwordPassageService

All Known Implementing Classes:
JSwordPassageServiceImpl, MockJSwordPassageServiceImpl
public interface JSwordPassageService
The service providing access to JSword. All JSword calls should preferably be placed in this service

  • Method Details

    • getOsisText

      OsisWrapper getOsisText(String version, String reference, List<LookupOption> options, String interlinearVersion, InterlinearMode displayMode)
      returns the Osis Text as a String
      Parameters:
      version - version to lookup
      reference - the reference to lookup
      options - the list of options for the lookup operation
      interlinearVersion - the version to add if there is an interlinear request, or blank if not
      displayMode - the mode with which display the passage text
      Returns:
      the OSIS text in an HTML form

    • getOsisText

      OsisWrapper getOsisText(String version, String reference)
      returns the biblical text as xml dom
      Parameters:
      version - version to lookup
      reference - the reference to lookup
      Returns:
      the OSIS text in an HTML form

    • getOsisTextByVerseNumbers

      OsisWrapper getOsisTextByVerseNumbers(String version, String numberedVersion, int startVerseId, int endVerseId, List<LookupOption> options, String interlinearVersion, Boolean roundReference, boolean ignoreVerse0)
      Given a verse number, we lookup the verse in question and return it. The numberedVersion is assumed to be KJV (i.e. KJV is used for the number lookup)
      Parameters:
      version - the version to use for the passage lookup
      numberedVersion - the version to be used to lookup the ordinal verse numbers
      startVerseId - the start of the verse number to look up
      endVerseId - the end of the verse
      options - the list of options for the lookup operation
      interlinearVersion - the version to add if there is an interlinear request, or blank if not
      roundReference - true to indicate to include everything to the next chapter.
      ignoreVerse0 - whether to ignore verse 0
      Returns:
      the OsisWrapper containing the text

    • getSiblingChapter

      KeyWrapper getSiblingChapter(String reference, String version, boolean previousChapter)
      Returns the previous or next chapter
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference
      version - the version of the book we are interested in
      previousChapter - true for previous chapter, false for next chapter
      Returns:
      the new reference to display on the user screen

    • peakOsisText

      OsisWrapper peakOsisText(String[] versions, org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key lookupKey, List<LookupOption> options, String interlinearMode)
      Parameters:
      versions - the list of versions to retrieve
      lookupKey - the key(s)
      options - the options to use
      Returns:
      the right passage

    • peakOsisText

      OsisWrapper peakOsisText(org.crosswire.jsword.book.Book bible, org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key range, List<LookupOption> options)
      Looks up a very short starter for ten
      Parameters:
      bible - the version to lookup the text from
      range - the key to the passage
      options - a set of lookup options
      Returns:
      an osis wrapper

    • getKeyInfo

      KeyWrapper getKeyInfo(String reference, String sourceVersion, String version)
      Returns info about the key
      Parameters:
      reference - the reference we are looking up
      version - version to look up the key in
      Returns:
      the key with its osis ID

    • expandToChapter

      KeyWrapper expandToChapter(String version, String reference)
      Expands the current reference to the whole chapter it is contained by
      Parameters:
      version - the book such as KJV, ESV
      reference - the reference
      Returns:
      the new reference representing the whole chapter

    • getInterleavedVersions

      OsisWrapper getInterleavedVersions(String[] versions, String reference, List<LookupOption> options, InterlinearMode displayMode, String userLanuage)
      a text with interleaved verses from each version
      Parameters:
      versions - the list of versions
      reference - the reference to be looked up in each version
      options - the list of options to use in the proper OSIS conversion
      displayMode - the mode with which display the passage text
      Returns:
      the osis wrapper

    • getPlainText

      String getPlainText(String version, String reference, boolean firstVerse)
      Returns some plain text for a passage
      Parameters:
      version - the version
      reference - the reference
      firstVerse - include the first verse only
      Returns:
      the plain text

    • getAllReferences

      String getAllReferences(String references, String version)
      Gets a String representation of all references, separated by a space.
      Parameters:
      references - the list of references
      version - the version
      Returns:
      the actual representation of all references

    • getAllReferencesAndCounts

      StringAndCount getAllReferencesAndCounts(String references, String version)
      Gets a String representation of all references, separated by a space.
      Parameters:
      references - the list of references
      version - the version
      Returns:
      the actual representation of all references

    • getFirstVerseExcludingZero

      org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key getFirstVerseExcludingZero(org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key key, org.crosswire.jsword.book.Book book)
      Parameters:
      key - the big key
      book - the book
      Returns:
      the new smaller key

    • getFirstVersesFromRange

      org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key getFirstVersesFromRange(org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key range, int context)
      Parameters:
      range - a particular range of verses
      context -
      Returns:
      the first verse, or verse 1 if verse 0 (only applies if verse 1 is actually in the range!)
